verses.name: Ezekiel 16:9
verses.text: Then washed I thee with water; yea, I throughly washed away thy blood from thee, and I anointed thee with oil.

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:10
verses.text: I clothed thee also with broidered work, and shod thee with badgers’ skin, and I girded thee about with fine linen, and I covered thee with silk.

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:11
verses.text: I decked thee also with ornaments, and I put bracelets upon thy hands, and a chain on thy neck.

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:12
verses.text: And I put a jewel on thy forehead, and earrings in thine ears, and a beautiful crown upon thine head.
